```{r include = FALSE}
library(DataComputing)
library(ggdendro)
```
<!-- put your content after this line -->
**1**
```{r}
Dists <- dist(mtcars)

```

**2**
```{r}
dendrogram <- hclust(Dists)
ddata <- dendro_data(dendrogram)

```
**3**
```{r}
ggdendrogram(dendrogram, rotate = TRUE) + geom_text(data = ddata$labels, aes(x = x, y = y, label = label), vjust = 0)

```

```{r}
CleanData <- NCI60 %>%
  gather(key = cellLine, value = expression, -Probe)

          
```
```{r}
OtherData <- CleanData %>%
group_by(Probe, cellLine)%>%
summarise(expression = mean(expression))%>%
  ungroup(expression)


```

```{r}
NewData <- CleanData %>%
  group_by(Probe) %>%
  summarise(spread = sd(expression))


```

```{r}
Cooldata <- OtherData %>%
  group_by(Probe) %>%
  filter(sd(expression)>4)
  
```


```{r}
Cooldata2 <- Cooldata %>%
  spread(key = Probe, value = expression)
row.names(Cooldata2) <- Cooldata2$cellLine  
```



```{r}
Visualisation <- Cooldata2 %>%
  select(-cellLine)

Dists2 <- dist(Visualisation)

```

```{r}
dendrogram2 <- hclust(Dists2)
ddata <- dendro_data(dendrogram2)
```

```{r}
ggdendrogram(dendrogram2, rotate = TRUE) + geom_text(data = ddata$labels, aes(x = x, y = y, label = label), vjust = 0)

```
